LanguageData.Axi_AR_Bulldog_21CA.label: SRSS Bulldog
LanguageData.Axi_AR_Bulldog_21CA.description: Little is known about the Bulldog, aside from the fact that the designer was based out of the small ecumenopolis world of Le Verdos. Examination of the rifle it detail points towards it originally having been a modification for another weapon, likely converting a traditional battle rifle into a bullpup configuration. Regardless of its origin, it has found popularity in pockets of systems around the galaxy as a short battle rifle packing a lot of punch, and a lot of recoil to go along with it.
LanguageData.Axi_AR_Bulldog_21CA.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Axi_AR_Bulldog_21CA.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_Bulldog_21CA.label: Bulldog bullet
